db:select.doc:name: Select from Account
db:select.db:sql: SELECT Id, NativeId, Name, Phone, Email, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingPostalCode, BillingState, BillingCountry, ShippingStreet, ShippingCity, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingState, ShippingCountry, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById FROM Account

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map { id : $.Id, nativeId : $.NativeId, name : $.Name, email : $.Email, phone : $.Phone, billingAddress: { street : $.BillingStreet, city : $.BillingCity, state : $.BillingState, postalCode : $.BillingPostalCode, country : $.BillingCountry }, shippingAddress: { street : $.ShippingStreet, city : $.ShippingCity, state : $.ShippingState, postalCode : $.ShippingPostalCode, country : $.ShippingCountry }, lastModifiedDate : $.LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById : $.LastModifiedById }
